frontmatter.title: Brachistochrone Simulator
frontmatter.description: Java iterative physics simulator for exploring the historic Brachistochrone Problem originally posed by Johann Bernoulli in 1696
frontmatter.lead: Iterative calculus-based simulation with accompanying OpenGL-powered graphics display program designed to verify relative performance of different solutions to the historic Brachistochrone problem. An accompanying report was written in LaTex which gives simulation results and a mathematical explanation of a rigorous solution.
